content:
CONTRACT AGREEMENT

This agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of the date of acceptance by Caller Intercept LLC ("Caller Intercept") and Beanstalk Products LLC dba "Beanstalk Consulting" (“Beanstalk”).

1. Service Term: The term of this Agreement shall be for 3 months, beginning on the date of acceptance by both parties.
2. Payment: The first month of service will be paid upfront at the rate of $2250. Subsequent months will be billed at a rate of $2250/month. If additional setup time is needed beyond the first month, it will be mutually agreed upon by both parties and billed accordingly.
3. Services Included: Beanstalk will provide the following services to Caller Intercept:
* Virtual SDR program
* Purchase of up to 2 domains for cold email outreach
* Up to 800 prospects a month via Apollo
* Inbox management for call scheduling
* Campaign & offer creation
* Campaign testing and analytics
1. Optional Add Ons:
* Virtual Cold Caller
* Handwritten Direct Mail Campaigns ($6.50/send)
* Sales Strategy Consulting ($200/hour for Dean)
* Additional Lead Sourcing
1. Testimonial: Beanstalk may require a written testimonial to be written in the first 90 days to receive the reduced price for the first month. A discount of $250 will be applied to the following month's invoice if a video testimonial is provided.
2. Performance Fee: Beanstalk will receive a performance fee equivalent to 20% of the MRR generated by customers sourced by Beanstalk for the duration of their tenure as a client of Caller Intercept.
3. Termination: Either party may terminate this Agreement upon 30 days written notice to the other party.
4. Entire Agreement: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous agreements and understandings, whether oral or written.
5. Modification: This Agreement may not be amended or modified except in writing signed by both parties.
6. Waiver: The failure of either party to enforce any provision of this Agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of future enforcement of that or any other provision.
7. Binding Effect: This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and assigns.
8. Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of [insert state], without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.
9. Dispute Resolution: Any dispute arising out of or related to this Agreement shall be resolved by binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. The arbitration shall be conducted in [insert city, state].

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date
